title: Sons of Nowhere: Strange and Unusual
description: Reese Masonâ€™s first week of high school at Acis Island has been a rough one. The last thing he expected was to make friends with Tessa Vasquez, the odd girl in his English Lit class. Sadly, he is convinced that her interest lies more with his rare deformity than with him.A prequel to the "Sons of Nowhere" novel series.
author: Nicholas Almand
